description:
The official MercadoLibre iOS app!

Search and buy what you are looking for  among the thousands of products and services published, wherever you are with your iPhone, iPad and iPod Touch, using a simple, fast and secure user interface.

Available in Argentina, Brazil, Chile, Colombia, Costa Rica, Ecuador, Mexico, Panama, Peru, Portugal, Dominican Republic, Uruguay and Venezuela.

Keep track of your favorite items, share them with your friends by email, Facebook and twitter, compare prices, ask questions to the sellers and buy them.

MercadoLibre Mobile features:
- Buy and ask questions
- Search suggestions
- Search history to save your recent searches
- Search filters: Item condition, buying mode, item categories, localization.
- Order results by relevance and price
- Bookmarks to keep track of what you are interested in
- View the most relevant information of each item such as questions, description and feedback received
- Pictures gallery with zoom option
- Share products by email and through social networks to your friends
And much more!
releaseNotes:
- Support for iOS 8
- This release requires iOS 7
- Bugfixing
